Got into gaming a few years ago when I met my husband. Early in our relationship he played through 1 and 2 while I watched to try and get me into gaming. Finally played and beat Portal and Portal 2. Officially one of my favorite games. The characters are wonderful. I was absolutely stumped and subsequently pissed at myself with many of the puzzles. Just wonderful.
Well, after 18 hours and a friend joining me I have officially beaten every level, including co-op and extras. Pretty good, would recommend if you're still on edge of buying it.

Очень хорошая игра ,именно в вторую часть ,должен поиграть каждый,игра с глубоким смыслом внутри себя,не смотря на то что порой бесит переходить из одной комнаты в другую ,мой личный совет при прохождении помните о глубоком смысле и сюжете данной игры ,он то и затягивает.
Концовка мне очень понравилась.

Отзывы никто не читает, поэтому напишу рецепт картошки фри.

- Ингредиенты:
Картофель 4 шт.
Соль по вкусу
Масло растительное 200 мл.

- Пошаговый рецепт приготовления:

Картофель чистим от кожуры и тщательно промываем под холодной водой.

Аккуратно нарезаем овощ тонкими равными полосками. Заливаем продукт холодной водой и оставляем на 10 минут.

Сливаем воду из картофеля и хорошенько протираем продукт бумажным полотенцем. Даем полностью обсохнуть.

В сковороду выливаем растительное масло и даем ему прогреться. После погружаем в кипящее масло картофель.

Жарим до яркого румянца около 5-7 минут. Переворачиваем шумовкой.

Аккуратно извлекаем румяный картофель из сковороды и выкладываем его на бумажную салфетку на 2 минуты. Даем обсохнуть.

Снова картофель погружаем в кипящее масло, но уже на 3 минуты.

После вторичной жарки опять кладем продукт на бумажные салфетки. Даем впитаться лишнему маслу.

Картошка фри на сковороде готова. Можно дополнить ее соусом и подавать к столу.

Arkadaşınızla ayrı tek başınıza ayrı keyifli bir oyun. Eğlenceli oyun mekaniği, keyifli diyaloglar ve karakterler. Oynarken rahatlamanızı sağlayan bir oyun gerçekten.

Ortalarına doğru hikayenin odağı biraz kayıyor ve bulmacalar garipleşmeye başlıyor ama size oraya kadar verdiği keyif bile yeter. Zaten öyle pahalı bir oyun da değil. Hem kendi başınıza hem arkadaşınızla geçireceğiniz on numara bir vakit demek

Great story, even better multiplayer. Would recommend to, anyone really. It was really cheap in the Steam Summer Sale. ($0.99 USD) and Source Engine makes the game even better. Would recommend to ANYONE who either played Garry's Mod or the first Portal game. Grab a friend and enjoy!

This is probably one of the best games ever made. The level design is subperb, the story telling is fantastic and it doesn't disturb the game itself and the mechanics it introduces to the Portal series are super fun to use and really fit in. Not to mention the co-op mode. Really good game, would recommend.

This game is one of the best that I played. Good audio, gameplay and everything. I'm recommending very much this game. POTATO GLADOS.

This game is simply fantastic - it's the first valve game I have played and it was brilliant, when i bought the game i had little knowledge of why it was so critically loved, I thought likely it is for the puzzles - which do a great job balancing difficulty and satisfaction, especially later on into the story, but unexpectedly what had me loving this game so much was it's unique characters, interesting story and even the intriguing larger sci-fi universe only explained through pictures and voice messages. 

So much about this game was fantastic but the stand out part of that for me was the humour - I'm very rarely laughing at video game dialogue and until this game I had seen very few previous attempts at humour in the medium. But this game truly nailed it - from the overhead announcers brilliant lines to the sarcastic comments from Glados, or the somewhat slapstick humour from Wheatly - just truly a joy to have unfold in-front of me, and I enjoyed every line.

The length of the game could be criticised by some but for me it was a refreshing change of pace from a traditional 20 hour campaign, in-fact in odd ways it reminds me of Titanfall 2's campaign both excellent stories that tell so much in a 7-10 hour experience and leaving you wanting more information on what would happen next, but still fulfilling enough so that they don't rely on an unlikely sequel to satisfy the story.

Now is where it is important to mention the downsides of the game but to be frank, I found almost none significant enough to harm the experience, some issues for others may have been more significant but personally, I found the game to still look relatively good, it's physics engine and puzzles still feel intuitive and the controls are logical and easy to understand.

Overall, the game is a wonderful experience and I implore anyone else to purchase this game, if your reading reviews trying to decide - just buy it - it is simply fantastic, and deserving of its title as a classic.

Zeka ve akıl gerektiren bölümleriyle sizi yorsa da bir bölümü bitirdiğinizde size bir şey başardığınız hissiyatını güzel veriyor bu oyun. Ayrıca bütün bunları çıkış zamanına göre cidden harika başarıyor. Grafikleri güzel, mekanizmaları hoş ve bir arkadaşınızla birlikte oynayabileceğiniz ayrı bir co-op hikayesi var ve gayet güzel bir uzunlukta. Bütün bunların yanında kendi test odanızı yapıp yayınlayabilir veya başka insanların yaptığı testleri oynayabilirsiniz. VALVE'nin çıkardığı oyun PORTAL2 2011'e göre bir geleceğin oyunu 2021'e göre ise bir eskilerin efsanesi. Herkese öneririm
Çok Beyin Yakabiliyo Ama Çok İyi Bir Bulmaca Oyunu.
